item.title: New Zealand Programming Contest (WelTec Site Page)
item.description: WelTec NZPC Site Page The next NZ Programming Contest is Saturday August 17th, 2024 Local site information (at WelTec) Venue Details to follow. Languages GNU C/C++ Version 10.2 (Linux) Java OpenJDK V11.0.14 Other languages can possibly be supplied if requested sufficiently in advance. OS/Hardware/etc We will use the DOMjudge automated judge system for running the contest. Timetable 12:30pm Registration and Briefing (required attendance) in E223 12:45pm - 1:45pm Practice session---to get used to the equipment and the method of result submission 1:45pm - 1:55pm Everyone thrown out of the lab so we can get it cleared for the contest 2pm - 7pm The actual contest E203/E204 7:30pm With luck the country wide provisional results Registration If you're competing at the Wellington site, please contact Chalinor (email below).
